html:
3.7.20  4:40 pm   I love your music bill. It has a very freeing nature of it. Would you consider the type of music you make to be inspired by a certain genre

     there are 2 problems with that ..... 1. i've heard too many genres, and 2. they all switched places while i was listening

     or is it a whole new "wurtzian" style of song?

     that could be the case, but it also should bear a hugely obvious resemblence to earth music, and the music of planet earth in general

     Thanks for all the great tunes

3.7.20  4:05 pm   Is pie a type of cake, or is cake a type of pie?

     they are both a type of stain

3.7.20  3:46 pm   what's your favorite font?

     regular

3.7.20  3:46 pm   what's a lesson you learned recently?

     darkness is actually very bright

3.7.20  3:24 pm   How touch the floor

     just relax

3.7.20  3:21 pm   what's the best way to start off your day?

     figure out where you left off, the previous day

3.7.20  3:17 pm   Why do couches have pillows?

     a handy weapon, close at hand, for the couch potato

3.7.20  2:22 pm   will your next upload be on March 18th

     oh that would be so nice. that would be so so nice. unfortunately i am trapped in like one of those things on the golf course where you get such a huge penalty you don't even notice that you've also ruined your pants

3.7.20  1:33 pm   You have a very distinct sound to your music that I really like, what would you say is the specific technique or something that gives it that quality?

     doing whatever i can

3.7.20  12:41 pm   how can anything exist

     impossible. could never happen

3.7.20  12:25 pm   do you remember the way we could change our lives

     i must admit that does sound extremely familiar

3.7.20  12:12 pm   How long does it usually take you to make a new video?

     about 8 weeks if i know what i'm doing. about 2 weeks if i am in panic mode

3.7.20  12:10 pm   when does the next video come out

     i'm having a countdown timer

3.7.20  11:59 am   Is pizza a fruit or vegetable 

     even better, it's a sacred meeting place for fruits and vegetables

3.7.20  11:32 am   hi bill how do i stop crying?

     the only way is to finish crying

3.7.20  10:57 am   What is the biggest waste of time?

      time cannot be wasted. it stops when nothing is happening

3.7.20  10:41 am   Do you believe fish are overrated?

     not sure what they are currently rated, but it should be 10

3.7.20  9:45 am   I accidentally drop my 20 bucks on the floor then it suddenly disappeared, where did it go?

     you might have accidentally dropped it into your bank account

3.7.20  9:26 am   What do you do besides music?

     sometimes i make videos to go with the music. or sometimes i use music to go with a video

3.7.20  9:24 am   Can you give a number of how many days is left before your next upload I can't find the countdown!

     i was never counting down days to it, but believe me i wish i was

3.7.20  8:58 am   i need ham do you have ham?

     no

3.7.20  8:52 am   Can I have a tiny poem?

     well,

3.7.20  8:10 am   Art block? What do? What do YOU do? 

     have you considered inventing some sort of flying machine

3.7.20  7:04 am   what is your favorite question someone has asked you?

     how about this one

3.7.20  5:49 am   what question would you recommend?

     how about this one

3.7.20  5:46 am   Thoughts on food

     it's ok

3.7.20  5:42 am   prime factor 50234

     ok. it's even, so in half is 25117 (easily seen as 50 2 34 going to 25 1 17). checking for 3, so knock 117, and 25 not, so no 3. checking 7, knock the 7, =2511, knock left from 21, =111, which is known (37x3) so no. checking 11 (in 25117) knock left from 22, = 311, knock 11, =3 (not 11). checking 13 (in 25117), up to 25130, =2513, knock the 13 left with 25=no. checking 17 (in 25117), knock from right, =251, knock 51 (knowkn 17x3), left with 2=no. checking 19 (in 25117), knock back from left = 6117, knock left back again to 57, = 4117, knock back left again to 38, = 317, known prime, but in case you're not sure, knock the left back again so it's 12 7 (127) even more well known prime, or if you don't believe me and feel like subtracting 57 (known 19x3) and knock the zero you must be at a single digit number (no 19) that's without even requiring you to bother subtracting 57 from 127. checking 23 (in 25117), from the right, up to 2514(0), 2514, knock down the left, 214, in half is 107 nope (known prime, the first 100s decade is a known 'full house'). checking 29 (in 25117). known trick: 203. add 203 is 2532(0), in half, is 1250 plus 16, 1266. in half is 633, by 3 is 211. add 29 won't reach 290, so no. checking 31 (in 25117) i'll add 93, = 2521(0). 2521 minus 31, seen as 252-3, = 249 already know that as 83x3 so no (or just add 31, to get 280, =28no.) checking 37 (in 25117), add 333 (the 111 trick x3) is 2544zap i mean 2545. double it, 50 9(0), =509, plus 111 is 620, 62(no) (in half 31no). checking 41 (25117), how about adding 123, = 2532, minus 82 is 245(0), doubled is 39 (3x13) so no. checking 43 (25117) added to right is 2516, in half is 1258, in half is 629, plus 301 (known trick for 43) is 930, no (31x3). checking 47 in 25117, so 2511 minus 4, is 2507, minus 47 means 250 minus 4, is 244, in half is 122, in half 61 so no. checking 53, 25117, = 2517(0), 2517, and 53 added to right again is 257, add to right again is a mildly tedioius 31(0). so no. checking 61 (in 25117). hm, how about 243. knock from left is 817. left can knock back to 20, =207. known 9, so def wrong range for 61. checking 67. 25117 minus 67 is 2505(0). doubled is 501. minus 201 (known trick for 67), =200 so no. checking 71, triple it to 213. 25117 plus 213, = 2513(0), and knock from right is an easy 2300 (=23) so no. checking 73, 25117, add to right is 2519. hm, triple the checker to 219, down to 2300 again, so no. checking 79 (in 25117), ouch, hm, 511 is a trick for 79, ... take that out of the middle? 20007, still not very useful for me unfortunately. must triple 79. that's 240-3 so 237. from 25117, ok, just 2511 minus 23. not fun for me. would be 2477 plus 11, how's that. ok, 2488, half to 1244, to 622, to 311, add 79 to right is 39no. checking 83 in 25117, evens out neatly to 252. half to 126. to 63, (known 7x9) = no. checking 89, i like 801 as a trick here, not the best but decent, triple it is 2403, put that on the right of 25117 is 2 75 20, = 2752. in half, forget it, try doubling the trick (801 to 1602), 2752 minus 1602, = 115. that's 23 so no. checking 97, easy, from right, (25117) is 2502. in half is 1 25 1 (1251), minus 291 (known triple of 97) would be... 10 6. 106, so 53 so no. checking 101, here's where it gets breezy, 25117 plus 303 is 2542(0), in half is 1 27 1 (1271), minus 101 is 117(0), (not 101). checking 103, 25117 add 103 is 2522(0), in half is 1 26 1 (1261), how about plus 309 (103x3). so that's 157(0). not 103 and too close. so no. checking 107. 25117 down to 2501. how about add 321 (triple) so like 250 plus 32. is 282. in half 141. known 47, also clearly no 107. checking 109, let's stop and figure out how high we have to go. 256 has square root of 16. so that means 160 squared is 25600. so if we reach 160 that's far enough. checking 109, or 327. 2511(7), 2511 minus 32, not fun, how about 2468 plus 11. 2479. minus 109 is 237(0), when compared with 327 is clearly wrong for 109. checking 113 (in 25117), add to right is 2523. go down, is 241. in that range it would have had to be 226, so no. checking..127 (that right there is what's known as the 'longest gap so far'), 25117 and down to , wait, 2511 minus 12, is 2499. by 3 is 833. plus 127 puts you evened out at less than 100(0) so no. checking not 129 (that's a 3), check 131. triple it, 393. use 393 on the right, 25117 go up to 2541. down 131 from right, is 241. down 131 goes to 11(0) and out. checking not 133 (that's 19) check 137. 25117, minus 137, means 2511 minus 13, so 2498, in half is 1299, by 3 is 433. is that 137? you would expect 411. (300 plus 111) so no. checking 139, ...... 75351 (just tripled the target number as an escape plan), add 139 to right is 7569, and down to 743. i've been really trying to avoid tripling 139 but i guess i have to, 140 tripled (i'm not good at this) 420, minus 3 is 417. (should have had my 117 more handy as a 39 triple there) 743 plus 417 is 115(0) and that's just 23. (no). checking 141 no that's 47, checking 143 not necessary, checking 147 no that's just 49, checking 149 of course. triple it is 447. 2511(0) minus 44(7).. erm.... 2511 minus 44 i hate my self, is 2464 plus 11 is 2475. double, is 48 no 495(0). double is 99(0) and no. checking 151 (149 and 151 are known twins), triple is 453, 25117 plus 453 means 2512 plus 45, 2557 right? plus 453 should end in 1(0), like 256 plus 45, ok 301. minus 151 definite no, after dropped zero you'd be 2 digits. checking 157, this is the last number to check because 159 would be a 3, and 160 squared is bigger than the target, and if everything so far was done correctly then the only available option left would be 157 squared, which should have to end in 9, which would be wrong, but just in case we'll check 157. 25117, down from right, which would mean 2511 minus 15, so 2496, in half goes to 1248, 624, 312, by 3 is 104 and no. so i am afraid here is where we finally meet the brick wall. so final answer 25117 x 2

3.7.20  4:57 am   what piece of music has made you cry

     the entire first 1 minute and 14 seconds of 'london town' by wings (audio only)

3.7.20  4:41 am   How do I forgive someone who's hurt me so many times?

     you could take a short break from trying to forgive them and then come back and try it again when you are feeling more refreshed

3.7.20  4:36 am   why am i stupid

     could be due to intelligence

3.7.20  4:28 am   how to die without committing suicide

     try to get really old

3.7.20  2:52 am   prove that a robot doesn't answer these questions

     i'm trying

3.7.20  2:34 am   everythings green and gold. Is that normal?

     even better

3.7.20  1:35 am   What is your favorite way to unwind or destress after a long day?

     a night of equal to similar length

3.7.20  1:14 am   Will Casio ever come to their senses and make a keyboard that has 100 built-in Bill Wurtz tunes?

     that all depends on how successful i can manage to be during my lifetime

3.7.20  12:46 am   What is your favorite type of glass?

     windows

3.7.20  12:23 am   what do you think of jazz?

     it just means pop

      most of my friends seem to hate it but i find that so weird.

     that reminds me of the time an old collegue of mine claimed to hate objects

     if you do like it, what songs/artists would you recommend?

     for you i would recommend anything that has the 'jazz' label affixed to it

3.7.20  12:10 am   Hi am I sad?

     sometimes maybe

3.7.20  12:00 am   How do the turns table?

     in a flipped-over and flippant manner

3.6.20  11:50 pm   When does music have to stop?

     for changes, sometimes

3.6.20  11:42 pm   Instead of having a boring normal computer screen, what if we just laid all of the pixels out in a line?

     not a very efficient use of space, and does not play at all to our brain's image recognition capabilities

3.6.20  11:30 pm   Why don't you listen to your own music after you've finished it?

     too scary. the shortcomings i may hear can be very scary. it's only scary if i know a lot of people have heard that recording

      Also, when answering a question about a certain song do you go back and listen to

     i try to avoid it

3.6.20  11:22 pm   What is it all about?

     things changing between changing and staying the same

3.6.20  11:22 pm   what was the writing process like for "go to the store"?

     almost sort of wrote it while i was recording it. this is not something i normally do

3.6.20  11:18 pm   bill, i think your music is okay

     i will see if i can make it better

3.6.20  11:15 pm   what is your favorite type of spaghetti

     pasghetti

3.6.20  11:14 pm   hey, so i used to record my music by just plugging it in with my mouse but i've realized the obvious thing of "wait this sounds like a computer". so now i have a portable 25-key that's doing the job swell. the problem now tho is i can't go out of my house to concentrate like i used to. cuz it's not just me and the computer. if i go to a coffee shop, or a library,.a bench in a park. i just feel like that would be weird. have you ever had this problem? have you ever gone out to record music? 

     no, but i've gone out to write it. i've used ear plugs to do that

3.6.20  11:14 pm   is the univers big? 

     more

3.6.20  11:08 pm   How do you avoid ducks?

     you have to use other ducks as a shield. let me know if that helps

3.6.20  11:08 pm   what motivates you?

     everything
